title: BJP disowning ISI spy was expected, but why is hyper nationalist media still silent
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim:
While BJP party leaders have started acknowleding privately regarding the infiltration of ISI into their party ranks, we at Alt News dug in further to show how all the three accused from Bhopal in the ISI spying case are actually friends with each other and at least two of them have been to Dubai on a common trip. This information is especially important now that it is being contended that the spy ring was ‘cultivated’ in Dubai.

The three men who have been arrested from Bhopal are namely Dhruv Saxena, Mohit Agrawal and Manish Gandhi and have been accused of facilitating ISI by providing crucial information about Indian army deployments. While we have shown in our previous articles as to how Dhruv Saxena was the District Coordinator of BJYM Bhopal IT Cell, in this article we will further establish the close relationship between the above three people. We’ll also establish as to how at least Dhruv Saxena and Mohit Agrawal have been associates of BJYM Bhopal President Anshul Tiwari for long.

First, let’s start with the relationship between Dhruv Saxena and Mohit Agarwal. According to their Facebook profile, Dhruv and Mohit have been friends since at least 2013.

It can be clearly seen that the two of them have been friends on Facebook since June 2013. They have multiple pictures together to further establish their closeness. In the picture below, Dhruv Saxena is on the left while Mohit Agrawal is in the centre.

Further, the following picture of Dhruv Saxena and Mohit Agrawal establishes their closeness with Anshul Tiwari who is the BJYM Bhopal President with Anshul Tiwari being close to all the top BJP leaders of Madhya Pradesh including the CM Shivraj Singh Chouhan.

BJYM Bhopal President Anshul Tiwari’s Facebook profile shows that he’s friends with both Dhruv Saxena and Mohit Agrawal.

In fact, Anshul Tiwari has known both Dhruv Saxena and Mohit Agrawal for over 3 years based on their Facebook friendships.

The third accused Manish Gandhi is also close friends with BJYM Bhopal IT District Coordinator Dhruv Saxena based on their pictures to Dubai together. The following picture is Dhruv and Manish together in Dubai in “One and only Royal Mirage Arabian Court”.
